definition: to accept (a bit reluctantly)/to put up with
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])

at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
to approach one's coffin (idiom); with one foot in the grave

sentences.english: During the Expo, people will exchange experiences of urban sustainable development.
sentences.chinese: 世博會期間，人們將就城市可持續發展交流經驗。

sentences.english: He commutes to New York every week, bunking in a hotel.
sentences.chinese: 雅甘每週往返於紐約，將就睡在旅館的雙層牀上。

sentences.english: Professor Li will give a series of lectures on the Middle East issue.
sentences.chinese: 李教授將就中東問題作一系列的講座。

sentences.english: This article reviews and gives summary of current research on integrin and the metastasis of ovarian cancer invasion.
sentences.chinese: 本文將就整合素和卵巢癌侵襲轉移研究現狀進行綜述。

sentences.english: Congress is to raise questions about the administration's handling of the post-Gulf War situation.
sentences.chinese: 國會將就政府對海灣戰爭後局勢的處理提出問題。

sentences.english: Niangs prohibit to fully compromise a house.
sentences.chinese: 十一娘不準備將就項家。

sentences.english: We will continue to stay in communication with all parties including Cambodia and Thailand over relevant issue.
sentences.chinese: 我們將就有關問題繼續與柬泰等各方保持溝通。

sentences.english: The two sides will keep close contacts and cooperation to appropriately handle the aftermath.
sentences.chinese: 雙方表示將就妥善處理善後事宜保持密切聯繫與合作。

sentences.english: The store doesn't have any, so you'll have to do without.
sentences.chinese: 商店裏什麼都沒有，所以你只好將就了。

sentences.english: This essay attempts to approach a study on Hevajra Mandalas.
sentences.chinese: 本文將就其中的喜金剛曼荼羅進行探討。

sentences.english: We were obliged, faute de mieux, to drink the local beverage .
sentences.chinese: 因爲沒有更好的飲料，我們只好將就着喝當地的。

sentences.english: A decision on whether to grant Mr. Pistorius bail is expected on Friday.
sentences.chinese: 週五將就是否允許保釋皮斯托利斯進行決定。

sentences.english: They will exchange views on the Korean nuclear issue and other issues of common interest.
sentences.chinese: 雙方將就朝核問題和其他共同關心的問題交換意見。

sentences.english: Her paper will examine the costs and benefits of such a proposal.
sentences.chinese: 她的報告將就此類提案進行得失權衡。

sentences.english: Human rights groups say they will appeal the demolition orders.
sentences.chinese: 人權團體表示，他們將就搗毀令提出上訴。

sentences.english: The meeting will deal with these problems.
sentences.chinese: 本次會議將就這些問題作出處理。

definition: to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss
to estimate/to reckon/CL:個|个[ge4]/(coll.) to suppose
to continue/to proceed with/to go on with
should/ought to/probably/must be/to deserve/to owe/to be sb's turn to do sth/that/the above-mentioned
